snippet: Drew Edwards scored a career-high 17 points, including five 3-pointers, and Ben Bentil came off the bench to get 16 points and 8 rebounds as No. 15 Providence (10-1) held on for a 74-67 victory at home over Bryant (2-9).
lead_paragraph: Drew Edwards scored a career-high 17 points, including five 3-pointers, and Ben Bentil came off the bench to get 16 points and 8 rebounds as No. 15 Providence (10-1) held on for a 74-67 victory at home over Bryant (2-9).
